faqs.q: How many calories in a small movie theater popcorn?
faqs.a: About 450 calories for a standard small serving with butter.

faqs.q: Why is movie theater popcorn so high in calories?
faqs.a: Added coconut oil and butter topping contribute most fats and calories; plain kernels are low-cal.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in movie theater popcorn?
faqs.a: Around 700 mg per small serving, mainly from salt and butter.

faqs.q: Calories in movie theater popcorn without butter?
faqs.a: Roughly 250 calories for a small serving, focusing on the popped corn itself.
